Let's create a plot with a caption below it:

```{r}
#| fig-align: center
#| fig-width: 6
#| fig-height: 6
#| fig.cap: "Figure: Here is a really important caption."
#| message: false
library(tidyverse)

ggplot(mpg) +
  aes(x = reorder(class, hwy), y = hwy, fill = class)
  geom_boxplot() +
  xlab("class") +
  theme(legend.position = "none")
```
